issue.title: [Doc] Arrow General Overview
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14763](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14763). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add general overview of Arrow - an introduction to the sections {**}PyArrow and R-Arrow Architectural Overview{**}.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14763?focusedCommentId=17450400) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
Any content would be a duplication of existing one in <https://arrow.apache.org/> and <https://arrow.apache.org/overview/>.
